channel.title: Adding a GFX to a client?
channel.description: How do u do this i know it is in class 23 and i know the code but what i want to know is do u just put the code in and change the id and it works? or is there more to it do u have to put in something for original data that makes it move and if so what? Say if i wanted to add the 508 teleports to my client how would i do it? Please help
